name: mm-calendar
description: A simple calendar rendering component. Intended for use in mm-datepicker but can be used for stand alone date selection. Note that mm-calendar makes heavy use of moment.js

attributes.name: useTapSelect
attributes.description: sets a default tap handler that selects the current date. Generally only set to false for cases where a custom selection behavior is desired

properties.name: pairDate
properties.description: A secondary date used to denote selection ranges for 2 picker scenarios

properties.name: viewDate
properties.description: The date object that represents the current month being viewed. Allows the viewable area to be altered without changing the selected date (if any).

properties.name: disablePast
properties.description: If true, dates after today's date will be disabled. If a date is specified dates after that date will be disabled

properties.name: disableFuture
properties.description: Behaves similarly to disablePast only for future dates

detail.name: date
detail.description: The date object that a user has selected

detail.name: target
detail.description: the dom node target for the tap that drove the calendar selection

detail.name: unix
detail.description: unix timestamp (seconds not millis) for the selected date
